overall_summary: The report contains critical discrepancies in property extent and boundary details that need to be addressed before release.

property_details.rule: A. PROPERTY DETAILS - Extent with units must match deed and be consistent across all sections
property_details.message_for_maker: The extent of the property in the report does not match the extent in the source documents.
property_details.suggested_fix: Correct the extent in the report to match the source document, ensuring consistency across all sections.

schedule_of_property.rule: B. SCHEDULE OF PROPERTY - Boundaries (N/S/E/W) must match deed exactly
schedule_of_property.message_for_maker: The boundaries in the report do not match the boundaries in the source documents.
schedule_of_property.suggested_fix: Update the boundaries in the report to reflect those in the source documents.
